artist: Author: Richard Loranger; Publisher: We Press ; Alaamuchy, N.J.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Stab stitched binding, letterpress on wove blue paper covers; 134 pp.
inscription: Inside of rear cover, black ink pen: Hi Fly - / every Hello / a new day / a new politic / a new chemistry / (smiley face) Rich
title: HELLO. poems
